front.title: Inline Security Parameter Payload for Mobile IP

abstract.t: This memo proposes a new payload extension for Mobile IP registrationrequests and replies. It allows security parameters (except for anysecret keys), typically associated with a Security Parmaeter Index(SPI), to be carried in-line with a Mobile IP authenticationextensions. The payload simplifies the use of public-keyauthentication with Mobile IP by allowing inline exchange ofcertificates. It even allows mixing of secret-key and public-keybased mechanisms in different authentication extensions within thesame Mobile IP message.
